forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
